title: Campus
synopsis: Takakage is troubled by a strange dream, seemingly of a former life as a soldier in the Sengoku Era of Japan. In that life, he loved the miko Ayame, though their love was doomed by war. Now, in this life, he is given a prophecy that he will meet the woman of his dreams.
staff: [['Omata, Shinichi', ['Producer']], ['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Kishida, Takahiro', ['Key Animation']], ['Nishi, Shigenari', ['Editing']]]
